create

public void create(Organization site)
            throws CaaersSystemException
Create a new organization. Note that this method must be used when entering a new organization (not OrganizationDao.save(gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.domain.Organization)). As written, it is not suitable for updating an existing organization.

Specified by:
create in interface OrganizationRepository
Parameters:
site - the site
Throws:
CaaersSystemException - the caaers system exception

saveImportedOrganization

public void saveImportedOrganization(Organization organization)
                              throws CaaersSystemException
This method is used in the Import Organizations flow. This will avoid calls to COPPA when importing Organization_Codes.txt from CTEP.
